医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Bio-Rad 推出三种 StarBright 红色染料，并扩大了与 StarBright 紫罗兰染料结合的抗体标记物的范围，以增强免疫学研究https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Bio-Rad-launches-三-StarBright-Red-Dyes-and-expands-range-of-antibody-markers-conjuerated-to-StarBright-Violet-染料增强免疫学研究.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Bio-Rad-launches-三-StarBright-Red-Dyes-and-expands-range-of-antibody-markers-conjuerated-to-StarBright-Violet-染料增强免疫学研究.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8167cd7e-b1b3-4abd-ad2f-e8dfc22167c0 Wed, 01 May 2024 10:19:00 -0400 Bio-Rad launches three StarBright Red Dyes and expands range of antibody markers conjugated to StarBright Violet Dyes to enhance immunology research

研究发现，睡眠时间短和长与糖尿病发病率较高有关研究人员发现了与睡眠时间和糖尿病相关的血浆蛋白质组模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Short-and-long-sleep-durations- Associated-with-higher-diabetes-incidence-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Short-and-long-sleep-durations- Associated-with-higher-diabetes-incidence-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e9f8c04-bb38-4eab-876a-0d95b7382b9e Wed, 01 May 2024 09:08:00 -0400 Short and long sleep durations associated with higher diabetes incidence, study finds
心理健康聊天机器人给美国监管框架带来新挑战人工智能 (AI) 驱动的健康应用程序的监管差距和潜在健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Chatbots-for-mental-health-pose-new-challenges-for-US-regulatory-framework.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Chatbots-for-mental-health-pose-new-challenges-for-US-regulatory-framework.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24370e86-821a-4ccd-9e1f-7f0b173156d4 Wed, 01 May 2024 06:41:00 -0400 Chatbots for mental health pose new challenges for US regulatory framework
5 月 5 日星期日，与 Bedfont® Scientific Limited 和 Heart of Kent Hospice 一起参加 2024 年风信子步行活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Join-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Heart-of-Kent-Hospice-for-their-Bluebell-Walk-2024-5 月 5 日星期日。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Join-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Heart-of-Kent-Hospice-for-their-Bluebell-Walk-2024-5 月 5 日星期日。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb63dda1-2865-44a2-9a2e-d80558c70dd0 Wed, 01 May 2024 06:22:00 -0400 Join Bedfont® Scientific Limited & Heart of Kent Hospice for their Bluebell Walk 2024, on Sunday, 5th May.
研究表明农业农药接触与帕金森病遗传变异增加有关因接触农药而影响帕金森病 (PD) 风险的遗传特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Study-links-agriculture-pesticide-exposure-to-increased-genic-variants-in-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Study-links-agriculture-pesticide-exposure-to-increased-genic-variants-in-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1f504af-a320-4596-aaf3-89a4f835171d Wed, 01 May 2024 06:04:00 -0400 Study links agricultural pesticide exposure to increased genetic variants in Parkinson’s disease
体育活动可以减少那些容易过度使用互联网和情绪调节困难的人的抑郁症网络成瘾在述情障碍和抑郁症状之间的中介作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Physical-activity-may-reduce-depression-in-those-prone-to-internet-overuse-and-emotional-regulation-difficulties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Physical-activity-may-reduce-depression-in-those-prone-to-internet-overuse-and-emotional-regulation-difficulties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=986401c2-de5d-4f9c-ad73-c9fb365fde97 Wed, 01 May 2024 05:13:00 -0400 Physical activity may reduce depression in those prone to internet overuse and emotional regulation difficulties
新的 VEGANScreener 旨在提高欧洲素食者的饮食质量研究人员开发了 VEGANScreener，这是一种新颖的饮食评估工具，包含 29 个问题，用于评估欧洲素食者的饮食质量，旨在解决营养充足问题并支持医疗保健评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/New-VEGANScreener-aims-to-boost-diet-quality-among-European-vegans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/New-VEGANScreener-aims-to-boost-diet-quality-among-European-vegans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1022364d-1102-4855-a010-d10eafb41194 Wed, 01 May 2024 00:50:00 -0400 New VEGANScreener aims to boost diet quality among European vegans
禽流感跨物种感染德克萨斯州和堪萨斯州的猫和牛美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 的《新发传染病杂志》上的一项研究报告了 H5N1 禽流感在德克萨斯州和堪萨斯州的猫和奶牛中传播的情况，显示牛出现全身性疾病，猫通过受感染的牛奶接触该病毒导致大量死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Avian-flu-crosses-species-infecting-cats-and-cattle-in-Texas-and-Kansas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Avian-flu-crosses-species-infecting-cats-and-cattle-in-Texas-and-Kansas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d502e328-5ce8-40d0-9f56-8247e811f6c8 Wed, 01 May 2024 00:22:00 -0400 Avian flu crosses species, infecting cats and cattle in Texas and Kansas
增强青少年体质可降低精神障碍风险研究表明，儿童和青少年的心肺健康、肌肉耐力和肌肉力量水平较高，可显着降低患焦虑、抑郁和注意力缺陷多动症的风险，这表明身体健康对青少年精神障碍起着至关重要的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Boosting-physical-fitness-in-youth-linked-to-lower-mental-disorder-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Boosting-physical-fitness-in-youth-linked-to-lower-mental-disorder-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3e950a9-af0e-4551-949f-2a922b59a828 Wed, 01 May 2024 00:07:00 -0400 Boosting physical fitness in youth linked to lower mental disorder risks
